channel.title: looking for a village to join that is doing the im very soon
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "looking for a village to join that is doing the im very soon"

item.title: Re: looking for a village to join that is doing the im very soon
item.content:encoded:
thanks for the help swan
don't need a village to join anymore sorry if you could have used

item.title: Re: looking for a village to join that is doing the im very soon
item.content:encoded: Well if you can read this in time my village will be blowing up tomorrow at 10am billy time. If you hurry you can make it before we go boom.

item.title: Re: looking for a village to join that is doing the im very soon
item.content:encoded: this village didn't work out so if any one else is interested let me know

item.title: Re: looking for a village to join that is doing the im very soon
item.content:encoded:
thanks check it out and if anyone else has a village just post and i'll check it out if this one doesn't work out
once again thanks for your time

item.title: Re: looking for a village to join that is doing the im very soon
item.content:encoded: The village I'm a member of, Flare Star Village, will be doing it sometime in the near future I believe.

item.title: looking for a village to join that is doing the im very soon
item.content:encoded:
if you have a village that only needs a player or two to do the impossible mission please send me a message in the game to let me know if i can join or not
Thanks in advance either way for your time
